mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_claim (claim_no, cust_no, report_no, claim_amt, claim_ttl_amt, protocol_claim_amt, max_claim_amt, claim_typ, insure_kind_nam, insure_kind_cd, claim_sts, sts_upt_tm, regi_date, accept_date, report_date, loss_occur_date, proposal_no, wht_claim, desc_content, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat ) values (#{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{claimTtlAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{protocolClaimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxClaimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{claimTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insureKindNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insureKindCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stsUptTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regiDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lossOccurDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proposalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whtClaim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ec_cust_claim set cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_no = #{reportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, claim_amt = #{claimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, claim_ttl_amt = #{claimTtlAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, protocol_claim_amt = #{protocolClaimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_claim_amt = #{maxClaimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, claim_typ = #{claimTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insure_kind_nam = #{insureKindNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insure_kind_cd = #{insureKindCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, claim_sts = #{claimSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sts_upt_tm = #{stsUptTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, regi_date = #{regiDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_date = #{acceptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_date = #{reportDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loss_occur_date = #{lossOccurDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proposal_no = #{proposalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wht_claim = #{whtClaim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc_content = #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where claim_no = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select claim_no, cust_no, report_no, claim_amt, claim_ttl_amt, protocol_claim_amt, max_claim_amt, claim_typ, insure_kind_nam, insure_kind_cd, claim_sts, sts_upt_tm, regi_date, accept_date, report_date, loss_occur_date, proposal_no, wht_claim, desc_content, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_claim where claim_no = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select claim_no, cust_no, report_no, claim_amt, claim_ttl_amt, protocol_claim_amt, max_claim_amt, claim_typ, insure_kind_nam, insure_kind_cd, claim_sts, sts_upt_tm, regi_date, accept_date, report_date, loss_occur_date, proposal_no, wht_claim, desc_content, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_claim

select claim_no, cust_no, report_no, claim_amt, claim_ttl_amt, protocol_claim_amt, max_claim_amt, claim_typ, insure_kind_nam, insure_kind_cd, claim_sts, sts_upt_tm, regi_date, accept_date, report_date, loss_occur_date, proposal_no, wht_claim, desc_content, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_claim where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rec_stat = '0'
and concat(claim_no,report_no,proposal_no) like concat('%', #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and insure_kind_nam like concat('%', #{insureKindNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
